Financial Independence

A Promising Path...

Posted by Harsh on March 28, 2020 · 2 mins read

When we heard about personal finance most of us try to get rid of it as soon as possible by saying that it is not my cup of tea or it should be handle by my financial advisor.

Wait...Think for an minute..

Does other person know your financial condition better than you ? If No, Can they able to handle your money better than you ?

Then, How can we handle our hard earned money so wisley that money works for us not we work for money ?

Here, I try to explain some basic rules of finance that lead your money to works for you.

1) 50/30/20 Rule

Here is the small illustrate is showing how this 50-30-20 rule should apply on your capital.

By looking at this you might think that I don't have any savings to invest, what should I do ? and it's normal thought that comman people have.

Usually when we recieve money via any source in our pocket We first spent it on our expenses, Savings = Income - Expenditure but ideally we should do following reverse calculation here.

Expenditure = Income - Savings
